name: FAST WHEELS
description:
Thanks for choosing to buy, download, and play Fast Wheels!

Fast Wheels is an adrenaline boosting racing game where you race on hand crafted tracks in customized cars! Upgrade your cars and learn the tracks to dominate your opponents.

Features

+ Over 10 Hand Crafted Race Tracks

+ Over 10 Vehicle Upgrades

+ Stat Keeping

+ Intuitive User Interface

+ Local Multiplayer

+ Vehicle Customization

+ Achievements

If you like Fast Wheels let us know and go like Divided By Zero Laboratories on Facebook and Twitter! Don't love Fast Wheels? Let us know how we can create games that you do love :)!
